yu.einstein.gdp2.util
Class ChromosomeManager

java.lang.Object
  yu.einstein.gdp2.util.ChromosomeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Chromosome>
public final class ChromosomeManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Chromosome>

The ChromosomeManager class provides tools to configure the chromosomes. This class follows the design pattern Singleton

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie
